titles.title: Urging the President to issue a proclamation designating a National Ski & Snowboard Month to call attention to the need for all people to exercise and get outdoors during winter.
Urging the President to issue a proclamation designating a National Ski & Snowboard Month to call attention to the need for all people to exercise and get outdoors during winter.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Urges the President to issue a proclamation designating a National Ski & Snowboard Month to call attention to the need for people to exercise and to get outdoors during winter.
